name: @aura/crypto-core
description: Rust/WASM cryptographic core with memory hygiene and TypeScript integration for privacy-focused applications

scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:web && npm run build:nodejs
scripts.build:release: npm run build:release:bundler && npm run build:release:web && npm run build:release:nodejs
scripts.build:release:bundler: wasm-pack build --release --target bundler --out-dir pkg && npm run optimize:bundler
scripts.build:release:web: wasm-pack build --release --target web --out-dir pkg-web && npm run optimize:web
scripts.build:release:nodejs: wasm-pack build --release --target nodejs --out-dir pkg-node && npm run optimize:nodejs
scripts.build:ci: npm run clean && npm run build:release && npm run validate:build
scripts.test:web: npm run build:web && npm run test:web:run
scripts.test:mobile: npm run test:ios && npm run test:android
scripts.test:cross-platform: npm run test && npm run test:chrome && npm run test:node && npm run test:web
scripts.test:all: npm run test:cross-platform && npm run test:mobile
scripts.test:fuzz: cd fuzz && cargo fuzz run encrypt_decrypt -- -max_total_time=60
scripts.test:fuzz:all: cd fuzz && cargo fuzz run encrypt_decrypt -- -max_total_time=30 && cargo fuzz run envelope_parsing -- -max_total_time=30 && cargo fuzz run key_operations -- -max_total_time=30 && cargo fuzz run aad_validation -- -max_total_time=30
scripts.test:security: npm run test:fuzz:all && npm run test:memory && npm run test:regression
scripts.prepare:npm: npm run build:release && npm run docs:generate && npm run audit:prepare

author: Aura Team
